nodes.text: Volgh Squadron served in the Hapan Royal Navy in 44 ABY. The squadron consisted of Hapan Miy'til starfighters, and they assisted the New Jedi Order during the evacuation from the Jedi Academy on the planet Ossus after the academy came under attack by the Lost Tribe of Sith. During the evacuation, one transport, Sharmok 718, was boarded by the Sith forces, who loaded the vessel with baradium. When the Jedi and Hapan forces noticed the Sharmok was acting strangely, Volgh Squadron opened fire, setting off the baradium. The Sharmok was destroyed, along with the entire Volgh Squadron.
